item.description:
FRIDAY APRIL 3 2009 at 7:30 pm Friday Nite Dance Party at Marco Polo Restaurant & Banquet Facility

Join Central CT Singles And Hundreds Of Local Singles and Dance The Night Away –Meet Someone Special And Party With Central CT Singles

* Specialty Pizza
* Pasta
* Salad
* DJ Johnny Playing Your Requests *

Marco Polo Restaurant & Banquet Facility
1250 Burnside Ave
East Hartford, CT 06108
I-84 to Exit 60 (near the Manchester line - next to Wickham Park)

The Party starts at 7:30 pm

Park in back parking lot and use the Banquet Entrance

SAVE MONEY - Tickets are only $15
ONLINE SPECIAL - 2 Tickets for $20 only at www.CentralCTSingles.com

Group Special – Half Price Tickets For Groups Of 10 Or More (only $7.50 per ticket!)

Check Out Our Ads In The Hartford Courant And The Hartford Advocate

Visit www.CentralCTSingles.com for more info or call (860) 236-3343

SEE YOU AT THE PARTY!



For the health and safety of our guests, we do NOT use lasers, smoke or fog machines.
b]
item.how_to_find_us: Use back parking lot, use the Banquet Entrance, look for the Central CT Signs

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: FRIDAY APRIL 3 Friday Nite Dance Party at the beautiful Marco Polo Restaurant
